# Get RWB data {#sec-chap100} ::::: {#obj-chap100} :::: {.my-objectives} ::: {.my-objectives-header} Objectives ::: ::: {.my-objectives-container} Download datasets for all years from the [RWB website](https://rsf.org/en/index). ::: :::: ::::: The first task is to download all datasets from the [RWB website](https://rsf.org/en/index). There is no place where I can get an integrated harmonized dataset. The only way I found out is to go to every year’s index and to use the button "Download this index". Fortunately the link stem and the structure of the file name is the same for all years: https://rsf.org/sites/default/files/import_classement/2025.csv. So I just have to change the year of the CSV file name. ## Glossary Entries {#unnumbered} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
term definition
CSV Text files where the values are separated with commas (Comma Separated Values = CSV). These files have the file extension .csv
````` ::: ::: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## Session Info {.unnumbered} ::: my-r-code ::: my-r-code-header Session Info ::: ::: my-r-code-container :::
